title: Method study basic principles
brief_description: The systematic approach to method study — the essence of which lies in the critical questioning of existing procedures and which results in increased productivity, lower unit costs, easier work and higher earnings. Case examples come from garage work, furniture and electrical manufacture and Local Government.
